articles.author: Justine Calma
articles.title: Texas heatwave and energy crunch curtails Bitcoin mining
articles.description: Bitcoin miners in Texas powered down to respond to an energy crunch triggered by a punishing heatwave. Energy demand from cryptomining is growing in the state.
articles.content:
